title: Amazing_Science_Fiction_Stories_Volume_34_Number_4_
creator: Ziff-Davis Publishing Company
description: Amazing Science Fiction Stories, Volume 34 Number 4, April of 1960. Published by Ziff-Davis Publishing Company, One Park Avenue, New York 16, New York. Dimensions are 5 1/2" width by 7 1/2" Height and 104.0 grams, 150 pages. Copyright was issued in 1960, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. The stories by David R. Bunch 'Remembering' and John Jakes 'The Red Telephone', were removed from the etext since their copyrights were renewed in a timely fashion and still are under copyright protection. Since pulps are almost impossible to find in libraries, these stories will not be exposed to the general public. If in the future permission can be gotten to include them, they will be added. Etext created by Gerard Arthus.
